verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Noah <S%H5146><s%>, Come <S%H935><s%> thou and all thy house <S%H1004><s%> into the ark <S%H8392><s%>; for thee have I seen <S%H7200><s%> righteous <S%H6662><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%>.

Of every clean <S%H2889><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> to thee seven <S%H7651><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%>, the male <S%H376><s%> and his female <S%H802><s%>; and of the beasts <S%H929><s%> that are not clean <S%H2889><s%> two <S%H8147><s%>, the male <S%H376><s%> and his female <S%H802><s%>:

of the birds <S%H5775><s%> also of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%>, male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%>, to keep <S%H2421><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>.

For yet <S%H5750><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, and I will cause it to rain <S%H4305><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>; and every <S%H3605><s%> living thing <S%H3351><s%> that I have made <S%H6213><s%> will I destroy <S%H4229><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%>.
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according unto all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded him <S%H6680><s%>.
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> was six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when the flood <S%H3999><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> was upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And Noah <S%H5146><s%> went in <S%H935><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and his wife <S%H802><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>' wives <S%H802><s%> with him <S%H8392><s%>, into the ark, because of <S%H6440><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the flood <S%H3999><s%>.

Of clean <S%H2889><s%> beasts <S%H929><s%>, and of beasts <S%H929><s%> that are not clean <S%H2889><s%>, and of birds <S%H5775><s%>, and of everything that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> upon the ground <S%H127><s%>,

there went in <S%H935><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> unto Noah <S%H5146><s%> into the ark <S%H8392><s%>, male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%>, as <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%>.
And it came to pass after the seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the flood <S%H3999><s%> were upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

In <S%H8141><s%> the six <S%H8337><s%> hundredth <S%H3967><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%>'s life <S%H2416><s%>, in the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%>, on the same <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> were all the fountains <S%H4599><s%> of the great <S%H7227><s%> deep <S%H8415><s%> broken up <S%H1234><s%>, and the windows <S%H699><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> were opened <S%H6605><s%>.
And the rain <S%H1653><s%> was upon the earth <S%H776><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>.

In the selfsame <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%>, and Shem <S%H8035><s%>, and Ham <S%H2526><s%>, and Japheth <S%H3315><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%>, and Noah <S%H5146><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>, and the three <S%H7969><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> with them <S%H8392><s%>, into the ark;

they <S%H1992><s%>, and every beast <S%H2416><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>, and all the cattle <S%H929><s%> after their kind <S%H4327><s%>, and every creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>, and every bird after its kind <S%H4327><s%>, every bird <S%H6833><s%> of every sort <S%H3671><s%>.

And they went in <S%H935><s%> unto Noah <S%H5146><s%> into the ark <S%H8392><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> is the breath <S%H7307><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>.

And they that went in <S%H935><s%>, went in <S%H935><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, as God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him <S%H3068><s%>: and Jehovah shut him in <S%H5462><s%>.

And the flood <S%H3999><s%> was forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>; and the waters <S%H4325><s%> increased <S%H7235><s%>, and bare up <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H8392><s%>, and it was lifted up <S%H7311><s%> above the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%>, and increased <S%H7235><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>; and the ark <S%H8392><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%>.

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>; and all the high <S%H1364><s%> mountains that were under <S%H8478><s%> the whole heaven <S%H8064><s%> were covered <S%H3680><s%>.
Fifteen <S%H6240><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> upward <S%H4605><s%> did the waters <S%H4325><s%> prevail <S%H1396><s%>; and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> were covered <S%H3680><s%>.

And all flesh <S%H1320><s%> died <S%H1478><s%> that moved <S%H7430><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, both birds <S%H5775><s%>, and cattle <S%H929><s%>, and beasts <S%H2416><s%>, and every creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creepeth <S%H8317><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, and every man <S%H120><s%>:
all in whose nostrils <S%H639><s%> was the breath <S%H5397><s%> of the spirit of life <S%H2416><s%>, of all that was on the dry <S%H2724><s%> land <S%H4191><s%>, died.

And every living thing <S%H3351><s%> was destroyed <S%H4229><s%> that was upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%>, both man <S%H120><s%>, and cattle <S%H929><s%>, and creeping things <S%H7431><s%>, and birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; and they were destroyed <S%H4229><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>: and Noah <S%H5146><s%> only <S%H389><s%> was left <S%H7604><s%>, and they that <S%H834><s%> were with him in the ark <S%H8392><s%>.
And the waters <S%H4325><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.
